name: Wilderness Evolved Battle
description:
Hello and Thank You for checking out our game.

 Our game is currently in early access and is not complete. We are adding new content on a daily basis. Current state is fully playable with all weapons working as expected. We are in process of adding new weapons and animations.  Current working Weapons are Sniper, Barrett, Shotgun, M4, Mk, Grenades, Axe, Hammer, Pistol. We are currently working on improving the current maps and adding new ones. Game can be played with up to 99 bots and is also multiplayer. Current play modes are Battle Royale and Team Deathmatch will be added in coming weeks.  We also have a survival addon coming in the near future. Currently we have Jeeps that can be driven and are in process of adding boats, tanks, Planes and some surprises.
